casebody.data:
CENTRE LANE PARTNERS, LLC, et al., Appellants,
v.
SKADDEN, ARPS, SLATE, MEAGHER & FLOM LLP, et al., Respondents. 2017-1165 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided February 15, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
